arts.ttl: Post-Match Reactions: Borussia Dortmund Overcome St. Pauli in Disciplined Display
arts.sum: We can all agree that Adeyemi has been very inconsistent since joining Dortmund in the summer of 2022, but we have also witnessed how he’s a player who can win you games when he’s playing at his absolute best. Borussia Dortmund haven’t won two Bundesliga games in a row this entire season.

arts.ttl: Dortmund beats St. Pauli 2-1 for back-to-back wins in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy scored again on Saturday as Borussia Dortmund secured back-to-back wins in the Bundesliga for the first time this season with a 2-0 victory at St. Pauli. Guirassy scored his 14th goal of the season against the run of play in the 50th when he tapped the ball in from close range after St. Pauli defender David Nemeth blocked his first effort.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Dortmund Collect Important Win in the North
arts.sum: BVB needed today’s points to keep pace with Wolfsburg and Gladbach ahead of them in the table, who both collected points to hold onto their positions. Eventually, though, Dortmund found their way ahead through none other than Serhou Guirassy and managed to see out the victory.

arts.ttl: Karim Adeyemi inspires Borussia Dortmund to away victory over determined St. Pauli
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund secured a 2-0 away win against St. Pauli on Matchday 24 with second-half goals from Serhou Guirassy and Karim Adeyemi securing the points for the visitors, after a very promising first half performance from the hosts. Serhou Guirassy scores the opening goal for Dortmund, breaking the deadlock early in the second half - IMAGO/Kirchner-Media/Thomas Haesler

arts.ttl: Match Preview: Borussia Dortmund Host Struggling St. Pauli
arts.sum: BVB look to build on their 6-0 win against Union Berlin when newly promoted St. Pauli come to the Westfalenstadion tomorrow. Newly promoted St. Pauli have struggled to score points this season, but they’ve had just enough success on the pitch to keep their heads above water in the league.

arts.ttl: Ryerson to miss out against St. Pauli
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund will be without Julian Ryerson when they face St. Pauli on the road this weekend.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs Borussia Dortmund preview: Schwarzgelben aim for late European push
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund will hope to make a late push for the Bundesliga's European spots when they visit Millerntor-Stadion on Saturday to take on St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: Transfer U-turn for Borussia Dortmund’s Karim Adeyemi
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund forward Karim Adeyemi was on the verge of joining Napoli in the winter transfer window but now in-demand under Niko Kovac, the 23-year-old can imagine staying at the…

arts.ttl: Ramy Bensebaini on life under Niko Kovač, Borussia Dortmund's goals for the rest of the season, Ramadan and more
arts.sum: Ramy Bensebaini spoke to bundesliga.com about how Borussia Dortmund hope to rejuvenate their season under new coach Niko Kovač, how he handles Ramadan as a professional footballer and more... bundesliga.com: A big win like that must lift the team?

arts.ttl: Daniel Svensson: "When I was offered the chance to play at BVB, I really wanted to do it"
arts.sum: Dortmund's winter transfer signing gave insights into his move to the Ruhrpott giants in an interview with Ruhr Nachrichten.
